name: file-length-lint
description: A lightweight extension to lint files based on their length

fileLengthLint.maxLines.description: Maximum number of lines allowed in a file before showing a lint error

fileLengthLint.enabled.description: Enable or disable file length linting

fileLengthLint.exclude.description: Glob patterns to exclude from file length linting

fileLengthLint.include.description: Glob patterns to include in file length linting

fileLengthLint.respectGitignore.description: Respect .gitignore files when scanning for files to lint

fileLengthLint.backgroundScanEnabled.description: Enable background scanning of files in the workspace

fileLengthLint.backgroundScanIntervalMin.description: Interval in minutes between background scans of the workspace

fileLengthLint.maxFilesPerScan.description: Maximum number of files to scan in a single background scan batch to limit resource usage

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
